Name: Houdini Redux
About the game: Houdini Redux is a easy to learn typing party game in which two players fight each other to gather the title of 'Grand Magus'. Houdini Redux is surely easy to learn but it is also hard to master! Our game sports: 3 Different mages to know and master (Houdini, Cardini, Malini) Online Multiplayer Local Multiplayer 5 Different background maps Different gamemodes Tournament mode Pixel art graphics
